thread.title: Africa's last absolute monarch renames Swaziland as 'eSwatini'

title: Africa's last absolute monarch renames Swaziland as 'eSwatini'
text:
Africa's last absolute monarch renames Swaziland as 'eSwatini' 12:37pm BST - 01:00 
Swaziland’s King Mswati III, Africa’s last absolute monarch, said he was officially renaming the country as the Kingdom of eSwatini. Julian Sattherthwaite reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Swaziland’s King Mswati III, Africa’s last absolute monarch, said he was officially renaming the country as the Kingdom of eSwatini. Julian Sattherthwaite reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qNjBa0
